quizDescription: Test your knowledge of legendary superheroes and formidable villains from various universes!
quizTags: Superheroes, Villains, Comics, Movies, TV Shows

questions.question: What is the real name of the superhero with the alias 'Batman'?
questions.explanation: The real name of the superhero known as 'Batman' is Bruce Wayne.

questions.question: Which superhero possesses the ability to climb walls and has a 'spider-sense' that warns of danger?
questions.explanation: Spider-Man, also known as Peter Parker, has the powers of climbing walls and a 'spider-sense' that alerts him to threats.

questions.question: What is the name of the villainous arch-enemy of Batman who is known for his eerie smile?
questions.explanation: The Joker is the notorious arch-enemy of Batman, recognized for his chilling smile and chaotic nature.

questions.question: Which superhero is the alter ego of Diana Prince and wields the Lasso of Truth?
questions.explanation: Wonder Woman, also known as Diana Prince, wields the Lasso of Truth and fights for justice.

questions.question: What is the name of the superhero with a suit of high-tech armor built by Tony Stark?
questions.explanation: Iron Man's real identity is Tony Stark, and he wears a powerful suit of high-tech armor.

questions.question: Which villain is the nemesis of the X-Men and has the power to manipulate magnetic fields?
questions.explanation: Magneto is the formidable nemesis of the X-Men and possesses the power to manipulate magnetic fields.

questions.question: What is the name of the superhero who is also known as the 'Man of Steel'?
questions.explanation: Superman is often referred to as the 'Man of Steel' due to his incredible strength and invulnerability.

questions.question: Which superhero is a member of the Avengers and carries a shield made of vibranium?
questions.explanation: Captain America, also known as Steve Rogers, wields a shield made of vibranium and is a prominent member of the Avengers.

questions.question: What is the name of the villainous alien who is a frequent adversary of Superman?
questions.explanation: Darkseid is a powerful and malevolent alien who often opposes Superman in battle.

questions.question: Which superhero is a mutant with retractable claws and accelerated healing powers?
questions.explanation: Wolverine, also known as Logan, is a mutant with retractable claws and a remarkable healing factor.

questions.question: What is the name of the superhero team that consists of Thor, Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, and others?
questions.explanation: The Avengers is a superhero team comprising various iconic heroes, including Thor, Iron Man, Hulk, and Captain America.

questions.question: Which villain is the primary enemy of Spider-Man and has abilities similar to those of a spider?
questions.explanation: Venom is a dangerous foe of Spider-Man and possesses powers similar to those of a spider.

questions.question: What is the name of the superhero with a magical hammer called Mjolnir?
questions.explanation: Thor is the superhero who wields the enchanted hammer Mjolnir and is the Norse God of Thunder.

questions.question: Which villain is the main antagonist in the 'Black Panther' movie and seeks to overthrow Wakanda?
questions.explanation: Killmonger, also known as Erik Stevens, is the primary antagonist in the 'Black Panther' movie.

questions.question: What is the name of the superhero who is the king of Atlantis and can communicate with marine life?
questions.explanation: Aquaman, also known as Arthur Curry, is the king of Atlantis and possesses the ability to communicate with marine creatures.
